alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 6:25PM CST until November 29 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Northern Winston County in east central Mississippi... * Until 730 PM CST. * At 624 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northeast of Smyrna, or 9 miles east of Kosciusko, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Mcmillan around 645 PM CST. Louisville around 650 PM CST. Millcreek around 655 PM CST. Betheden around 700 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mccool and Ethel. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
